text: Vengeance (2004) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) for their Raw brand. It took place on July 11, 2004 at the Hartford Civic Center in Hartford, Connecticut. It was the fourth Vengeance event held by WWE. ==Results== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Tyson Tomko (with Trish Stratus) defeated Val Venis (with Nidia). Singles match 2:52 2 Tajiri and Rhyno defeated Garrison Cade and Jonathan Coachman. Tag team match 7:30 3 Batista defeated Chris Jericho. Singles match 12:19 4 La Résistance (Róbert Conway and Sylvain Grenier) (c) defeated Ric Flair and Eugene by disqualification. Tag team match for the World Tag Team Championship 12:30 5 Matt Hardy defeated Kane. No Disqualification match 10:34 6 Edge defeated Randy Orton (c). Singles match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 26:36 7 Victoria defeated Molly Holly. Singles match 6:22 8 Chris Benoit (c) defeated Triple H. Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 29:06 ==References== ==Other websites== *Vengeance 2004 Official website Category:2004 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Hartford, Connecticut Category:WWE Vengeance Category:2000s in Connecticut Category:2004 in the United States Category:History of Hartford, Connecticut Category:July 2004 events
title: Vengeance (2004)
